publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-3065 Karen Whitefield: Airdrieonians Football Club—That the Parliament expresses deep regret at the news that Airdrieonians Football Club has been placed into full liquidation; recognises the important part that the club has played in maintaining a sense of community in Airdrie and surrounding villages since its inception in 1878; commends the supporters of the club who have endeavoured to keep the club alive over the past two years, and wishes the supporters and members of the provisional supporters’ trust every success in their efforts to keep a footballing identity within the town.

S1M-3065 Karen Whitefield: Airdrieonians Football Club—That the Parliament expresses deep regret at the news that Airdrieonians Football Club has been placed into full liquidation; recognises the important part that the club has played in maintaining a sense of community in Airdrie and surrounding villages since its inception in 1878; commends the supporters of the club who have endeavoured to keep the club alive over the past two years, and wishes the supporters and members of the provisional supporters’ trust every success in their efforts to keep a footballing identity within the town. Supported by: Mr Murray Tosh*

S1M-3065 Airdrieonians Football Club (lodged on 2 May 2002) Donald Gorrie*, Bristow Muldoon*, Mrs Lyndsay McIntosh*, Cathie Craigie*, Scott Barrie*, Des McNulty*, Mr Kenny MacAskill*, Karen Gillon*, Angus MacKay*

S1M-3065 Airdrieonians Football Club (lodged on 2 May 2002) Andrew Wilson*, Mr Kenneth Macintosh*, Janis Hughes*, Johann Lamont*, Mr Kenneth Gibson*, Trish Godman*, Elaine Smith*, David Mundell*, Brian Fitzpatrick*, Marilyn Livingstone*, Mr Michael McMahon*, Mr Brian Monteith*, Kate Maclean*

S1M-3065 Airdrieonians Football Club (lodged on 2 May 2002) Dr Winnie Ewing*, Cathy Peattie*
S1M-3065 Airdrieonians Football Club (lodged on 2 May 2002) Bill Butler*
